description: Nodebuster is a short, experimental incremental game about busting nodes and destroying reality.

v0.0.1hf.description:
A Hotfix to actually make the mod work.
When downloading new mods make sure to delete the script hooks folder in the local files if you have it.
v0.0.1hf.title: Hotfix

v0.1.0.description:
This is the Beta release of the archipelago mod for Nodebuster.

# New Features!
### UI Features.
* A New Connection Menu.

* Upgrade List. - There is now a form of a tracker inbuilt. When opened it will show you how many items you have received and how many you have not. It also breaks the items up into their different groups.

* Visible Hint Locations. - Adds a border around an upgrade node when an item was hinted for that location.

### New Randomization Options.
* Boss Drops. - Boss drops are now able to be added to the itempool. when you defeat a boss for the first time instead of giving a core it will instead give a randomized item.

* CryptoMine Levels. - Inside the CryptoMine menu you are able to upgrade the speed of which the cryptomine will convert bits to netcoins. This option when enabled will randomize those said levels.

* Progressive Items. - The Rate at which the game scales felt a little off. so with this setting enabled instead of being able to get high levels of upgrades early you will instead upgrade them progressively.

* Death Link actually works!

* Every Goal Works.

### And More!
* Better APWorld Rules to better prevent softlocks. (some settings may cause these rules to not work properly although I have not had a problem yet)
v0.1.0.title: Beta Release!

v0.1.1.description:
## TL;DR
New (unofficial but I am hopeful) update just dropped. This update primarly fixes some bugs in both the apworld and client.
- **Update YAMLs?** Not necessary.
- **Apworld update?** Yes.
- **Client update?** Yes.

## What's Changed
* Add support for localhost servers by @josephwhite in https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/pull/10
* Censor password text by @josephwhite in https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/pull/19
* Validation and reinforcement for resources and rewards by @josephwhite in https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/pull/24
* UUID, slotdata rework, and unlocking checked levels by @josephwhite in https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/pull/26
* Deathlink: fix multisends, new causes and popup by @josephwhite in https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/pull/21
* Instructions for Godot (4.x) Mod Loader v7.0.1 by @josephwhite in https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/pull/20

## New Contributors
* @josephwhite made their first contribution in https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/pull/10

## Other notes
This is my first project using Godot and working with an apworld early in its development. More stable logic, bugfixes, and other surprising features are planned but will take time. Thank you for your patience.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/commits/v0.1.1
v0.1.1.title: Nodebuster Archipelago v0.1.1

v0.1.2.description:
## TL;DR

Happy New Year. 2026 is the year ALL locations have appropriate logic. Progressive Item and Boss Drop settings will (hopefully) no longer result in softlocks. 

Please see the changelog for a more comprehensive list of changes. Thank you.

* Update YAMLs? Yes
* Apworld update? Yes.
* Client update? Yes.

## What's Changed
* Set Version to 0.1.2 by @josephwhite in https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/pull/27
* Progressive Item Groups for v0.1.2 by @josephwhite in https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/pull/35


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/josephwhite/Emerlads-Nodebuster_AP_Mod/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2
v0.1.2.title: Nodebuster Archipelago v0.1.2
